title: Federico Maioli
text:
I study the spatio-temporal distribution of marine species, mainly elasmobranchs. I am an enthusiastic user of Hmsc and sdmTMB and all kind of species distribution models.
When not modelling species distribution, I enjoy spending time outdoor, scuba diving, free-diving, and photographing wildlife.
